Returns: an EntityIterator containing one entity per event in the cursor
newEntityIterator(android.database.Curso.Description: Creates a new iterator for events
newEntityIterator(android.database.Curso.FullName: public static EntityIterator newEntityIterator (Cursor cursor, ContentResolver resolver)

ClassDesc: Class that represents an Event Entity. There is one entry per event. Recurring events show up as a single entry. This is a helper class to make batch operations easier. A @B_android#content#ContentResolver_E@ or @B_android#content#ContentProviderClient_E@ is required as the helper does additional queries to add reminders and attendees to each entry.
